attributes.action: Strip Elton John of his knighthood
attributes.background: His unpatriotic behaviour doesn’t warrant the rank of a knighthood and doesn’t respect a democratic decision same as all the remainers

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
